message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $120 for it. This offer allows you to enjoy significant savings while ensuring I receive a fair return for my efforts in sourcing and providing this item. I believe this price strikes a good balance between value and cost. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
